casebody.data:
LUBRIZOL ADVANCED MATERIALS, INC.
v.
NATL. UNION FIRE INS. CO. OF PITTSBURGH 2018-1815 Supreme Court of Ohio. May 15, 2019

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On motion for admission pro hac vice of Laura A. Foggan. Motion denied. S.Ct.Prac.R. 2.02(B) allows for admission pro hac vice only upon motion of the attorney seeking pro hac vice admission. Laura A. Foggan may file a motion for pro hac vice admission that moves for her own admission and otherwise complies with S.Ct.Prac.R. 2.02(B).
